plot: Eliana Tapia is "La Nany", a nasal-voiced woman from La Florida who changes the Valdivieso's family life just when she arrives at their house. Chilean remake of the popular American sitcom "The Nanny".
plot_en: Eliana Tapia is "La Nany", a nasal-voiced woman from La Florida who changes the Valdivieso's family life just when she arrives at their house. Chilean remake of the popular American sitcom "The Nanny".
plot_es: Eliana Tapia is "La Nany", a nasal-voiced woman from La Florida who changes the Valdivieso's family life just when she arrives at their house. Chilean remake of the popular American sitcom "The Nanny".
title: La nany
